channel.title: Artists on renzwertig ////
channel.description: Recent content in Artists on renzwertig ////

item.title: Christian Renz
item.description: Besides being a producer and instrumentalist, I also publish own songs and instrumentals.

item.title: La Bussola Kids Worship
item.description: Together with a team from Switzerland, we’re working on modern worship songs for children’s services, church services and youth camps in Italian.

item.title: Lukas-KIDS
item.description: Under the name “Lukas-KIDS”, Christian Renz and Marco Ginsberg publish modern worship songs for children’s services, church services and youth camps. The songs are written and recorded together with kids from Lukas-Gemeinde in Berlin.

item.title: Rudi Hampel
item.description: Rudi Hampel was a singer, guitarist and songwriter from Korntal (Germany). He published his own songs under the moniker “Soundkaiser” and was active in many other groups, such as St. Zion and b.o.s.c.o.l.
